title: hello Rito
body: i need one favour. i have 123 RP on my account and i think i ask u if u can give me 2 RP because i'll buy Key fragment :/ only 2 RP  :) Thanks for Helping!

replies.body:
SKT T1 Jhin is right actually! Shoot me a quick sketch of what you're hoping to get from that chest and I'll make sure that 2 RP gets to your account.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Riot will give you a small amount of rp in exchange for a drawing of something league related (usually a champion). I would draw something on ms paint and attach it to this post before they get back into the office tomorrow!
